'''Janet''' is the mother of [[Lindy Dougal]].

==History==
Janet's ex-husband, Gregory, was upset with the custody arrangement after they got divorced. He impulsively decided to kidnap Lindy and disappear with her. As he fled with her, he was pulled over by Ryan, who was suspicious of Gregory because he saw the ring tan line and a quickly packed bag for Lindy. He went back to his squad car and radioed in his suspicions. When it was confirmed that there was an Amber alert out for Lindy, Ryan stalled while they waited for additional help to arrive. Sensing that Gregory was starting to get impatient, Ryan went over to his car and quietly explained that it wouldn't end well for him if he fled with Lindy and convinced him to turn himself in and let Lindy go back with her mother while he was arrested.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
She is divorced from [[Gregory Dougal]]. Together, they have a daughter, Lindy.

===Familial===
Her daughter, Lindy, was taken by her ex-husband, who was attempting to kidnap her as he was unhappy with their custody arrangement. He was quickly discovered and Lindy was returned to her mother.
